verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:41
verses.text: And the Philistine came on and drew near unto David; and the man that bare the shield went before him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:42
verses.text: And when the Philistine looked about, and saw David, he disdained him: for he was but a youth, and ruddy, and of a fair countenance.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:43
verses.text: And the Philistine said unto David, Am I a dog, that thou comest to me with staves? And the Philistine cursed David by his gods.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:44
verses.text: And the Philistine said to David, Come to me, and I will give thy flesh unto the fowls of the air, and to the beasts of the field.
